rpCntInfo.cntInstr: Contact to request additional technical information

citRespParty.rpOrgName: Integrated Oceans Management, Fisheries and Oceans Canada

dataExt.exDesc: The dataset is national in scope and extends to the outer boundaries of Canada's exclusive economic zone.

dataIdInfo.idPurp:
The spatial planning framework for Canada's national network of MPAs is comprised of 13 ecologically defined bioregions that cover Canada's oceans and the Great Lakes.
Note that the geographic boundaries for the bioregions are fuzzy and may change based on ecosystemic conditions.

Consts.useLimit: Bioregional boundaries depicted in this layer are only for general illustrative purposes.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Detailed descriptions and discussions on the federal network of marine bioregions can be found in:

DFO. 2009. Development of a Framework and Principles for the Biogeographic Classification ofCanadian Marine Areas. DFO Can. Sci. Advis. Sec. Sci. Advis. Rep. 2009/056.

http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/csas-sccs/publications/sar-as/2009/2009_056-eng.htm

DFO. 2010. Proceedings of a National Science Advisory Process to Provide Guidance on the Development of a Framework and Principles for the Biogeographic Classification of Canadian Marine Areas; 15-16 June 2009. DFO Can. Sci. Advis. Sec. Proceed. Ser. 2009/039.

http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/csas-sccs/publications/pro-cr/2009/2009_039-eng.htm

and

National Framework for Canada's Network of Marine Protected Areas

http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/oceans/publications/dmpaf-eczpm/framework-cadre2011-eng.asp#c6

thesaName.resTitle: Government of Canada Core Subject Thesaurus

placeKeys.keyword: Atlantic Ocean, Pacific Ocean, Arctic Ocean, Canada

rpCntInfo.cntInstr: Contact to request additional technical information

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.0.3348

prcStep.stepDesc: The bioregions boundaries were delineated using a previous version of the dataset. The basemap is derived from Natural Resources Canada's Atlas of Canada 1,000,000 National Frameworks Data, Administrative Boundaries. The latter was merged into one polygon and then processed into the bioregions polygons using the cut function. A topology check was run on the dataset as well.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
